Class ControlsView

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.controls.ControlsView
public class ControlsView extends Object
Small UI helper that encapsulates common view operations used by ControlsController. Keeps warnings, button text and hover effects out of the controller so the controller can focus on event wiring and key-binding logic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Create a view helper bound to the provided UI controls.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControlsView

      public ControlsView(javafx.scene.control.Label lblInfo, javafx.scene.control.Label lblHeader, javafx.scene.control.Button btnReset, javafx.scene.control.Button btnSave, javafx.scene.control.Button btnCancel)
      Create a view helper bound to the provided UI controls.
      Parameters:
      lblInfo - label used to show short inline messages and warnings
      lblHeader - header label shown at the top of the controls pane
      btnReset - reset button instance (may be null in tests)
      btnSave - save button instance (may be null in tests)
      btnCancel - cancel button instance (may be null in tests)

      public void addHoverEffect(javafx.scene.control.Button b)

    • showInlineWarning

      public void showInlineWarning(String message)
      Show an inline warning message and a modal warning dialog as a fallback.

      The inline warning is displayed in the info label for a short time and the visual style is toggled to make it noticeable.

      Parameters:
      message - the warning message to display
